author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4158: When a core is registering in ZooKeeper it may not wait long enough to find the leader due to how long the potential leader waits to see replicas.

author: tomaz
msg: Deprecate CLOUDFILES_US and CLOUDFILES_UK storage provider constants and
Driver referenced by this constant takes a "datacenter" keyword argument
and can be one of 'ord', 'dfw' or 'lon'.
Note: Deprecated constants will continue to work for the foreseeable
